text: Harold Smith Prince (born Harold Smith; January 30, 1928 – July 31, 2019) was an American theatrical producer and director. He won 21 Tony Awards. He was involved with Cabaret, West Side Story and Madame Butterfly. He was born in New York City. Prince died on 31 July 2019 in Reykjavík, Iceland at the age of 91.Simonson, Robert. "Harold Prince, Giant of the Broadway Stage, Dies at 91" Playbill, July 31, 2019Weber, Bruce. "Hal Prince, Giant of Broadway and Tony Award Collector, Dies at 91" The New York Times, July 31, 2019 ==References== Category:Theatre producers Category:American theatre directors Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:1928 births Category:2019 deaths
title: Harold Prince
